name: filter
info: Filters applied to this record or empty if record was not filtered

name: recordIndex
info: Unique index (per haplotype) for each alignment record

name: alignScore
info: Alignment score assigned by the PAV score model

name: alignScoreProp
info: Proportion of score to maximum possible score

name: matchProp
info: Proportion of bases matching in the alignment

name: qryProp
info: Proportion of the total query sequence aligned in this record

name: qryOrd
info: Order of the aligned query segment from the start of the query sequence to the end

name: qryRegion
info: Location of this variant in the assembly
